sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export const ContactForm = ({ name, setName, phone, setPhone, email, setEmail, handleSubmit, }) => { return ( <>
setName(e.target.value)} id="name" type="text" className="form-control" placeholder="Enter your name" />
setPhone(e.target.value)} id="phone" type="tel" pattern="[1-9][0-9]{2}[1-9][0-9]{2}[0-9]{4}" className="form-control" placeholder="Enter your phone number" />
setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} id="email" type="email" className="form-control" placeholder="Enter your email" />
); };
